name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course will teach the use of English in the field of mechanical and electrical engineering through the reading of relevant literature. All areas of English proficiency (listening, speaking, writing, reading) will be considered.

**At the lecturer’s sole discretion, a make-up exam may be granted upon presentation of approval for leave from the university system no later than 5 days after the date of exam. The format of the make-up exam will be determined by the lecturer.

You will automatically fail the course with 8 or more unexcused absences. You may get an excused absence only upon presentation of an approval for leave from the university system.
